Package org.springdata.cassandra.core

Interface Summary
BatchedStatementCreator Batched Statement Creator interface to create Statements that are using in Batch operations.
BatchOperation Base interface for batch operations
CassandraOperations Operations for interacting with Cassandra.
DeleteOperation Base interface for delete operations
EntryCallbackHandler<T>  
GetOperation<T> Base interface to get entity (actually select).
SaveNewOperation Base interface to save new entity (actually insert).
SaveOperation Base interface to save entity (actually update).
SchemaOperations SchemaOperations interface
 

Class Summary
AbstractFindOneOperation<T> Abstract Find One Operation
AbstractFindOperation<T> Abstract Find Operation
AbstractGetOperation<T> Abstract Get Operation
AbstractMultiGetOperation<T> Abstract Multi Get Operation
AbstractSaveOperation<T,O extends QueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet,O>> Abstract save operation implementation
CassandraMappingConverterFactoryBean Convenient factory for configuring a CassandraConverter.
CassandraSessionFactoryBean Convenient factory for configuring a Cassandra Session.
CassandraTemplate The CassandraTemplate is a convenience API for all CassandraOperations using POJOs.
CassandraTemplateFactoryBean Convenient factory for configuring a CassandraTemplate.
DefaultBatchOperation Implementation of the BatchOperation.
DefaultCountOperation<T> Count operation implementation
DefaultDeleteOperation<T> Implementation of the DeleteOperation.
DefaultExistsOperation<T> Exists operation implementation
DefaultMultiFindOperation<T> Default Find by Ids operation
DefaultSaveNewOperation<T> Implementation for SaveNewOperation
DefaultSaveOperation<T> Implementation for SaveOperation
DefaultSchemaOperations SchemaOperations implementation
ReaderEntryCallbackAdapter<T>  
ReaderRowMapper<T> Row mapper that converts Row to Entity
